content.question: Let f and g be continuous functions. If <math><semantics><mrow><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><msubsup><mo>∫</mo><mn>2</mn><mn>6</mn></msubsup><mi>f</mi></mrow></mstyle><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mi>d</mi><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>5</mn><mtext> and </mtext><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><msubsup><mo>∫</mo><mn>6</mn><mn>2</mn></msubsup><mi>g</mi></mrow></mstyle><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mi>d</mi><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>7</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext> then </mtext><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><msubsup><mo>∫</mo><mn>2</mn><mn>6</mn></msubsup><mrow><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mn>3</mn><mi>f</mi><mo stretchy="false">(</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo>+</mo><mi>g</mi><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mi>d</mi><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo></mrow><annotation>MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaahmart1ev3aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaaeaaaaaaaaa8 qadaWdXaWdaeaapeGaamOzaaWcpaqaa8qacaaIYaaapaqaa8qacaaI 2aaaniabgUIiYdGccaGGOaGaamiEaiaacMcacaWGKbGaamiEaiabg2 da9iaaiwdacaqGGaGaaeyyaiaab6gacaqGKbGaaeiiamaapedapaqa a8qacaWGNbaal8aabaWdbiaaiAdaa8aabaWdbiaaikdaa0Gaey4kIi pakiaacIcacaWG4bGaaiykaiaadsgacaWG4bGaeyypa0JaaG4naiaa cYcacaqGGaGaaeiDaiaabIgacaqGLbGaaeOBaiaabccadaWdXaWdae aapeGaaiikaiaaiodacaWGMbGaaiikaaWcpaqaa8qacaaIYaaapaqa a8qacaaI2aaaniabgUIiYdGccaWG4bGaaiykaiabgUcaRiaadEgaca GGOaGaamiEaiaacMcacaGGPaGaamizaiaadIhacqGH9aqpaaa@662B@</annotation></semantics></math>
